headline: JAKKS Pacific Announces a Sweet New Licensing Partnership with The Hershey Company
summary: SANTA MONICA, Calif., Dec. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- JAKKS Pacific, Inc. (NASDAQ: JAKK), a leading designer and marketer of toys, and The Hershey Company, one of the world’s largest confectionery brands, announced today a new partnership that will bring the beloved Hershey branding to JAKKS Pacific’s popular Charming line of small dolls and collectibles, marking the first-ever confection-themed expansion of the fashionable mini-doll brand. content.title: JAKKS Pacific Announces a Sweet New Licensing Partnership with The Hershey Company
content.summary: SANTA MONICA, Calif., Dec. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- JAKKS Pacific, Inc. (NASDAQ: JAKK), a leading designer and marketer of toys, and The Hershey Company, one of the world’s largest confectionery brands, announced today a new partnership that will bring the beloved Hershey branding to JAKKS Pacific’s popular Charming line of small dolls and collectibles, marking the first-ever confection-themed expansion of the fashionable mini-doll brand.
